message: Broke ass snowflakes like you don't have any land.

Good for N.C. what happened to the thought process of being inclusive?? These people who think they need special treatment because they've chosen to change their gender!! Then we've got blacks who think they're more special then other races. Please, people, we don't need to start more wars over this stuff. So, NC has to have their federal funding taken away because of some people who want a special rest room? And, Target has to go out of business and 1,000's of jobs will be lost because someone wants a special rest room. We have lost our minds in the USA.

I will not ever put any of my children in a leash. I have 4 kids and one on the way and feel like it may be hard to keep them with us, but my parental preference is no leash! I don't care what other parents prefer...that's their choice.

A form of government in which God (or a deity) is recognized as the king or immediate ruler, and his laws are taken as the statute-book of the kingdom, these laws being usually administered by a priestly order as his ministers and agents; hence a system of government by a sacerdotal order, claiming a divine commission; also, a state so governed.""""
